title: Banned for 14days?
body: I was just banned for 14 days and I'll admit I was toxic but it said that I was going to be e-mailed with extra info ect and I would like to know why I still haven't received that e-mail yet.

replies.body: You should have received some type of email sent to the one used when you first signed up, but if not you should also be able to view your reform card in the client itself. If for some reason you haven't seen either of those, reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can provide all the context for you one on one.

I was wondering what the cut off date for receiving your end of season rewards was? I remember a few years ago it was august 14th I'm pretty sure. Was just wondering what the stipulations were for Season 7 when it comes to receiving your end of season rewards

Sorry I missed this comment last night! The cutoff date is about 3 months before the end of the season. Last year, it was around Aug 7th, but the official end of the 2017 season hasn't yet been announced AFAIK.
So I was banned lastnight and it lasts till August 12th, if the season were to end Nov 7th and the cut off date was aug 7th I will not receive my rewards? even tho I was banned before that date?

Unfortunately, Supz would be correct here. IF the season ends on Nov 7 and you've got a ban until Aug 12, I don't believe you would be eligible for the rewards since you would have had a ban within 3 months of the end date.

Op will have to get the reform card from the client since you guys don't send emails anymore: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/MgXB3cYb-got-permaban-without-flamingriot-shows-no-evidence?comment=000500000000

Do you guys not keep each other in the loop for this kind of stuff?

That was posted by Tantrum about a month ago, which leaves quite the wiggle room for some players to have been banned during the time when we did still send email reports. There are still quite a few banned accounts that were sent notification emails about the punishment ;).
Could you reply to my question please about the cut off date for receiving your end of the season rewards?
